ygData.subject: hello
ygData.msgSnippet: Saw all the messages posted so far and thought I d introduce myself too. I m a nice, normal, gay guy who plays a few characters on the Innorruk server (seems
ygData.messageBody:
Saw all the messages posted so far and thought I'd introduce myself too. I'm a
nice, normal, gay guy who plays a few characters on the Innorruk server (seems
like everyone else is on other servers). Personally I've never had my sexual
preference come into play in the game (and not being much of a roleplayer
don't think it would). I live out in the Philadelphia burbs, late 20something
and work with computer systems and networks.

Hope everyone enjoys the game and if you ever pop onto Innorruk feel free to
say hi.

Johnathan Spectre
JSpectre (13th necro Innorruk)
